explanation: [0-0] It's a three-way split screen, with black on the top and bottom. The middle part shows an outdoor plaza with a wet ground. [0-4] First, the camera zooms in. As the white object moves, it becomes clear that it is an advertising board with a human figure. The head of the figure lifts up and down, and on the ground, a fountain spout continuously sprays water. The scene then switches to a fountain scene, with the black sections disappearing. A man in a white short-sleeved shirt and black pants lies face down on the edge of the fountain, hands behind his back. In the background, several people are sitting on a bench resting, along with buildings and trees.
